item.title: Sara GodSword, Auto Casting Sara Strike :)
item.dc:creator: @pk_for_me pk for me
item.description:
@pk_for_me wrote:

WARNING : YOU NEED SILABS NEW CLIENT WELL, V2 AND AUTO-UPDATES FOR THIS TO WORK UNLESS YOU WANT A ROD OF INVIDI TI AUTO-CAST IT,

Look in you’r client.Java for this…

public class client extends Player implements Runnable {

Under that Add this

public void SaraStrike(){//Making the Void hitDiff = misc.random(30); stillgfx(83, absY+1, absX); stillgfx(83, absY-1, absX); stillgfx(83, absY, absX+1); stillgfx(83, absY, absX-1); inCombat(); PkingDelay = 10; teleportToX = absX; teleportToY = absY; }

now, You have made the Main Void, now for the Easy bit…

look for public int GetWepAnim()

Under that Add this…

if(playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 7644) // Sara GodSword { SaraStrike(); return 811; }

Credits : 75% me, 25% Miss.Silabsoft for teh ownage Client

Any Errors, Please Post :), Thanx
